Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerReceiver, Serializable, Runnable
public class GameController extends Object implements Runnable, ServerReceiver, Serializable
the controller of a specific game
Author:
Andrea Ferrini

    • startPingTimer

      public void startPingTimer(Connection connection)

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String username, Connection connection)
      this method adds a player in this game
      Parameters:
      username - Player's username
      connection - Player's connection

    • run

      public void run()
      Implementation of the method run, in Runnable interface. This method starts the game. It creates a new model for the game and stes every parameter, then shares the model with all clients. Finally, it asks the first move
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • newServerMessages

      public void newServerMessages()
      sends a message to all the players

      It handles messages from player
      Specified by:
      onMessage in interface ServerReceiver
      Parameters:
      message - Message from player

    • tryToDisconnect

      public void tryToDisconnect(Connection connection, String playerName)
      It manages error that can came from network
      Specified by:
      tryToDisconnect in interface ServerReceiver
      Parameters:
      connection - Connection that raise a problem
      playerName - player that causes the problem

      public void closeGame()
      Delete file game when it is over (it can be called also when game is not over). Remove gameServer from registry
